skins.shipDescription: Northampton-class Heavy Cruiser ¨C Chicago, Hull Number CA-29!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Chicago, fourth ship of the Northampton-class. I've never really done anything noteworthy in battle, and I've never been particularly lucky. But I'll do my best for you, Commander. So be nice to me~ *Kiss*
skins.acquisition: So you're the commander? You're looking at me almost like you want me to feel you up. Things will get fun starting tomorrow.
skins.login: Don't get too into ignoring me, okay, Commander~?
skins.details: Don't just stare at boring numbers all day... how about staring at something with more meat to it for a change?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Women can change as quickly as the wind in Chicago, Commander~
skins.secretaryIdle2: At this distance, nobody else can hear us~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Your shoulders are so stiff. How about a massage to help you relax?
skins.secretaryTouch: I'll show you how to have a good time~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Aahh~ You're a naughty boy, Commander~
